net.powermatcher.api

Interface MatcherEndpoint

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Agent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TransformingConcentrator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Auctioneer, BaseMatcherEndpoint, Concentrator, PeakShavingConcentrator

    public interface MatcherEndpoint
extends Agent
    MatcherEndpoint defines the interface for classes that can receive a Bid and send a PriceUpdate, containing a Price based on that Bid. A MatcherEndpoint can be linked with zero or more AgentEndpoint instances. These are linked by a Session.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface net.powermatcher.api.Agent

        Agent.Status

    • Method Summary

      Connects this MatcherEndpoint instance to an AgentEndpoint.

      Called by the AgentEndpoint via the Session to update the Bid used by this AgentEndpoint instance.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.powermatcher.api.Agent

        getAgentId, getStatus, setContext

    • Method Detail

      • connectToAgent

        void connectToAgent(Session session)
        Connects this MatcherEndpoint instance to an AgentEndpoint.
        Parameters:
        session - the Session that will link this AgentEndpoint with a MatcherEndpoint.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when this matcher is not connected to the cluster

      • agentEndpointDisconnected

        void agentEndpointDisconnected(Session session)
        Notifies the Agent that this MatcherEndpoint instance is disconnected from the AgentEndpoint.
        Parameters:
        session - the Session that used to link this MatcherEndpoint with an AgentEndpoint.

      • handleBidUpdate

        void handleBidUpdate(Session session,
                   BidUpdate bidUpdate)
        Called by the AgentEndpoint via the Session to update the Bid used by this AgentEndpoint instance.
        Parameters:
        session - The session linking this MatcherEndpoint with a specific AgentEndpoint instance.
        bidUpdate - The new BidUpdate.
